subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
Officiating (Sports)
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: Mr. Phillips quintupled the salaries of major league baseball umpires as their representative, but caused many of them to lose their jobs by having them resign en masse.
snippet: Mr. Phillips quintupled the salaries of major league baseball umpires as their representative, but caused many of them to lose their jobs by having them resign en masse.
